QuestData.Title: Report to the King
QuestData.Description: We have slowed the Iron Horde down, but this war is far from over... I'll stay here and continue our efforts to hold back the Iron Horde.$b$bThe King needs to know about what we have accomplished here today, and the threat we face in the future.$b$bIt is probably best if you report to King Wrynn yourself, $n.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with King Anduin Wrynn at Stormwind in Elwynn Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: This is worse than I imagined.$b$bThe Iron Horde is proving to be a massive threat to our people... I don't want anymore bloodshed, but I fear we are out of options.$b$bWe need a plan before we strike.
